name: Scroll2Read
description:
Scroll2Read is a fantasy action-adventure game that brings the story about a medieval city in danger. Let yourself take the role of one of the people who have pledged to save it from the disasters caused by an ancient artifact. You have to experience problems of staying in the cursed city and you would never regret that.

The following features await you in the game:
- original combat system including attacks, pushes, parrying and using special abilities
- various storyline quests
- fancy looking graphics with top-down view
- adventure game's features such as inventory and advanced interaction with the game world
